Symbol.Script_UI:
! ============================================================================= ! Tabpage Structure Definition ! =============================================================================
TABID_ROOT = -1 _idxTab = 1 TABID_POSTSANDBORADS = _idxTab : _idxTab = _idxTab + 1 TABID_REPRES = _idxTab : _idxTab = _idxTab + 1 TABID_DESCRIPTIONS = _idxTab : _idxTab = _idxTab + 1
! ============================================================================= ! Display actual tabpages ! =============================================================================
ui_dialog `Параметры Ограждения` ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page
PostTabTitle = `` if iObjectType = FENCE_HORIZONTAL then PostTabTitle = `Стойки и Доски` endif
if iObjectType = FENCE_VERTICAL then PostTabTitle = `Стойки, Доски и Планки` endif
ui_page TABID_POSTSANDBORADS, TABID_ROOT, PostTabTitle , "uiTab_Dimension_flat(1)" gosub "PostAndBoardsPage"
ui_page TABID_REPRES, TABID_ROOT, `Отображение и Покрытия`, "uiTab_2DRepr_flat(1)" gosub "AppearancePage"
ui_page TABID_DESCRIPTIONS, TABID_ROOT, `Характеристики`, "uiTab_Descriptions_flat(1)" gosub "descriptionPage"
n = REQUEST ("Working_length_unit", "", workingLengthUnit)
!-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Image links for archive ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- file_dependence "uiTab_Dimension_flat(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_2DRepr_flat(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_Descriptions_flat(1)"
! ============================================================================= end ! =============================================================================
! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Subroutines ! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"PostAndBoardsPage":
textElevInfield = 3 textElevBoolean = 2 textElevPen = 4 textElevMaterial = 6 infieldHeight = 19 infieldHeightPen = 22 infieldHeightMaterial = 25 outfieldHeight = 15 rowDistance = 22 rowDistanceApp = 26
pageStartY = 5 if iObjectType = FENCE_HORIZONTAL then xCenter = 222
xLeftStr1 = 0 Strlength1 = 110 + 20 xLeftStr2 = xLeftStr1 + Strlength1 + 7 Strlength2 = 90 - 15 yLeftStr1 = pageStartY yCurrent = yLeftStr1
ui_separator xCenter, yLeftStr1, xCenter, pageStartY + 230
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Стойка`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, 16 ui_style 0, 0 yCurrent = yCurrent + 22
ui_outfield `Количество Стоек`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield ui_infield "np", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent + rowDistance + textElevInfield
ui_outfield `Ширина`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield ui_infield "pw", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent + rowDistance + textElevInfield
ui_outfield `Длина`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield ui_infield "pd", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent + rowDistance + textElevInfield
xCenter = 300 - 220 yCenter = pageStartY + 165
xPict = 90 yPict = 45
ui_pict 1, xCenter - xPict / 2, yCenter - yPict / 2, xPict, yPict, 1 !ui_fences_elev_upper_hor.png
xCurrent = xCenter + xPict / 2 + 2 yCurrent = yCenter - yPict / 2 ui_infield "ph", xCurrent, yCurrent, 70, infieldHeight ui_tooltip `Выступ Стоек над Досками`
xLeftStr1 = 10 + 222 Strlength1 = 110 + 20 xLeftStr2 = xLeftStr1 + Strlength1 + 7 Strlength2 = 90 - 15 yLeftStr1 = pageStartY yCurrent = yLeftStr1
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Доски`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, 16 ui_style 0, 0 yCurrent = yCurrent + 22
ui_outfield `Расположение`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1 - 40, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield ui_infield{3} "bp_m", xLeftStr2 - 40, yCurrent, Strlength2 + 40, infieldHeight, 8, "", 2, 1, 90, 20, 90, 20, "", `Между Стойками`, 1, "", `Перед Стойками`, 2 yCurrent = yCurrent + rowDistance + textElevInfield
ui_outfield `Длина`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield ui_infield "bd", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent + rowDistance + textElevInfield
xCenter = 300 yCenter = pageStartY + 165
xPict = 90 yPict = 45
ui_pict 2, xCenter - xPict / 2, yCenter - yPict / 2, xPict, yPict, 1 !ui_fences_elev_lower_hor.png
xCurrent = xCenter + xPict / 2 + 2 yCurrent = yCenter + yPict / 2 - infieldHeight * 3 - 2 ui_outfield `Минимум`, xCurrent, yCurrent, 70, outfieldHeight
xCurrent = xCenter + xPict / 2 + 2 yCurrent = yCenter + yPict / 2 - infieldHeight * 2 - 2 ui_infield "gb", xCurrent, yCurrent, 70, infieldHeight ui_tooltip `Зазор между Досками`
xCurrent = xCenter + xPict / 2 + 2 yCurrent = yCenter + yPict / 2 - infieldHeight ui_infield "bh", xCurrent, yCurrent, 70, infieldHeight ui_tooltip `Высота Доски` endif
if iObjectType = FENCE_VERTICAL then xCenter = 222
xLeftStr1 = 0 Strlength1 = 110 + 20 xLeftStr2 = xLeftStr1 + Strlength1 + 7 Strlength2 = 90 - 15 yLeftStr1 = pageStartY yCurrent = yLeftStr1
ui_separator xCenter, yLeftStr1, xCenter, pageStartY + 230
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Стойка`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, 16 ui_style 0, 0 yCurrent = yCurrent + 22
ui_outfield `Количество Стоек`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield ui_infield "np", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent + rowDistance + textElevInfield
ui_outfield `Ширина`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield ui_infield "pw", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent + rowDistance + textElevInfield
ui_outfield `Длина`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield ui_infield "pd", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent + rowDistance + textElevInfield
xCenter = 300 - 220 yCenter = pageStartY + 165
xPict = 90 yPict = 45
if iBoardEndStyle = 1 then ui_pict 3, xCenter - xPict / 2, yCenter - yPict / 2, xPict, yPict, 1 !ui_fences_elev_plane_upper_ver.png if iBoardEndStyle = 2 then ui_pict 4, xCenter - xPict / 2, yCenter - yPict / 2, xPict, yPict, 1 !ui_fences_elev_tri_upper_ver.png if iBoardEndStyle = 3 then ui_pict 5, xCenter - xPict / 2, yCenter - yPict / 2, xPict, yPict, 1 !ui_fences_elev_round_upper_ver.png
xCurrent = xCenter + xPict / 2 + 2 yCurrent = yCenter - yPict / 2 ui_infield "ph", xCurrent, yCurrent, 70, infieldHeight ui_tooltip `Выступ Стоек над Досками`
xLeftStr1 = 10 + 222 Strlength1 = 110 + 20 xLeftStr2 = xLeftStr1 + Strlength1 + 7 Strlength2 = 90 - 15 yLeftStr1 = pageStartY yCurrent = yLeftStr1
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Доски`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, 16 ui_style 0, 0 yCurrent = yCurrent + 22
ui_outfield `Верх Досок`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1 - 40, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield ui_infield{3} "iBoardEndStyle", xLeftStr2 - 40, yCurrent, Strlength2 + 40, infieldHeight, 8, "", 2, 1, 90, 20, 90, 20, "", `Ровный`, 1, "", `Треугольный`, 2, "", `Закругленный`, 3 yCurrent = yCurrent + rowDistance + textElevInfield
ui_outfield `Длина`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield ui_infield "bd", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent + rowDistance + textElevInfield
xCenter = 340 yCenter = pageStartY + 88
xPict = 80 yPict = 51
if iBoardEndStyle = 1 then ui_pict 6, xCenter - xPict / 2, yCenter - yPict / 2, xPict, yPict, 1 !ui_fences_elev_plane_board_ver.png if iBoardEndStyle = 2 then ui_pict 7, xCenter - xPict / 2, yCenter - yPict / 2, xPict, yPict, 1 !ui_fences_elev_tri_board_ver.png if iBoardEndStyle = 3 then ui_pict 8, xCenter - xPict / 2, yCenter - yPict / 2, xPict, yPict, 1 !ui_fences_elev_round_board_ver.png
xCurrent = xCenter - 108 yCurrent = yCenter + yPict / 2 + 2 + textElevInfield ui_outfield `Минимум`, xCurrent, yCurrent, 55, outfieldHeight
xCurrent = xCenter - 50 yCurrent = yCenter + yPict / 2 + 2 ui_infield "gb", xCurrent, yCurrent, 70, infieldHeight ui_tooltip `Зазор между Досками`
xCurrent = xCenter + 25 yCurrent = yCenter + yPict / 2 + 2 ui_infield "bw", xCurrent, yCurrent, 70, infieldHeight ui_tooltip `Ширина`
xCenter = 222 yCenter = pageStartY + 142 ui_separator xLeftStr1, yCenter, xCenter * 2, yCenter
yLeftStr1 = pageStartY + 148 yCurrent = yLeftStr1
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Планки`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, 16 ui_style 0, 0 yCurrent = yCurrent + 22
ui_outfield `Количество Планок`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield ui_infield "nhb", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent + rowDistance + textElevInfield
ui_outfield `Высота`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield ui_infield "hbh", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent + rowDistance + textElevInfield
ui_outfield `Длина`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield ui_infield "hbd", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent + rowDistance + textElevInfield endif
return
"AppearancePage": dim st2DParamNames[][] st2DParamNames[1][1] = "gs_cont_pen" : st2DParamNames[1][2] = "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[2][1] = "gs_fill_type" : st2DParamNames[2][2] = "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[3][1] = "gs_fill_pen" : st2DParamNames[3][2] = "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)" st2DParamNames[4][1] = "gs_back_pen" : st2DParamNames[4][2] = "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)"
dim st3DParamNames[][] st3DParamNames[1][1] = "gs_detlevel_3D" : st3DParamNames[1][2] = "ui_list_detailLevel3D_flat(1)" st3DParamNames[2][1] = "gs_shadow" : st3DParamNames[2][2] = "ui_list_shadow_flat(1)" if iObjectType = FENCE_VERTICAL then st3DParamNames[3][1] = "gs_resol" : st3DParamNames[3][2] = "ui_list_resol_flat(1)" endif
dim stSurfaceParamNames[][] stSurfaceParamNames[1][1] = "bomat" : stSurfaceParamNames[1][2] = "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" stSurfaceParamNames[2][1] = "pomat" : stSurfaceParamNames[2][2] = "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" if iObjectType = FENCE_VERTICAL then stSurfaceParamNames[3][1] = "bamat" : stSurfaceParamNames[3][2] = "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" endif
call "ui_structure_Representation" parameters all bDraw2DGroupList = 1, listfieldID = TABID_REPRES, listFieldPosY = 0, listFieldHeight = 265, stDescHeader = "", stValueHeader = "", st2DParamNames = st2DParamNames, st3DParamNames = st3DParamNames, stSurfaceParamNames = stSurfaceParamNames
! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! image list for archive ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- file_dependence "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_detailLevel3D_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_resol_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_shadow_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_surface_flat(1)"
return
"descriptionPage":
dim stParamNames[16] stParamNames[1] = "gs_list_cost" stParamNames[2] = "gs_list_manufacturer" stParamNames[3] = "gs_list_note" stParamNames[4] = "gs_list_location" stParamNames[5] = "gs_list_accessories" stParamNames[6] = "FM_Type" stParamNames[7] = "FM_InventoryNumber" stParamNames[8] = "FM_SerialNumber" stParamNames[9] = "FM_ProductionYear" stParamNames[10] = "FM_ObjectWeight" stParamNames[11] = "FM_ObjectWeightUnit" stParamNames[12] = "gs_list_custom1" stParamNames[13] = "gs_list_custom2" stParamNames[14] = "gs_list_custom3" stParamNames[15] = "gs_list_custom4" stParamNames[16] = "gs_list_custom5"
call "ui_object_listing" parameters all listfieldID = TABID_DESCRIPTIONS, listFieldPosY = 0, listFieldHeight = 265, stDescHeader = "", stValueHeader = "", stParamNames = stParamNames return
